meanings.definition: Dogs trained to protect a property or individuals from intruders.
meanings.sent1: The guarddogs barked loudly when they sensed a stranger approaching the house.
meanings.sent2: The guarddogs were on duty all night, ensuring the safety of the farm.
meanings.sent3: The guarddogs wagged their tails happily as they chased away the pesky raccoon.
meanings.sent4: The guarddogs stood vigilant like statues, ready to defend their territory.
meanings.sent5: The guarddogs were fierce and loyal, always ready to defend their owners.

meanings.definition: A person or group of people responsible for protecting something or someone.
meanings.sent1: The security team acted as guarddogs for the VIP guests at the event.
meanings.sent2: The guarddogs of the castle ensured that no unauthorized person entered the premises.
meanings.sent3: The guarddogs of the museum were always alert, ready to protect the valuable artifacts.
meanings.sent4: The guarddogs of the neighborhood patrolled the streets, keeping a watchful eye on any suspicious activity.
meanings.sent5: The guarddogs of the bank were well-trained professionals, dedicated to keeping the money safe.
